name: Escape Duality
description:
This is a virtual reality escape room game. You are stuck in a room, caught between day and night. You must change day to night and night to day in order to escpae this room. Good luck!

Used VRIF framework to get the initial interactions going, had to code the rest. Used some free art assests, but had to build a lot of other things (like the keypad from basic shapes). It was fun project and turned out better than I expected for a game jam game.

Controls 

Grip Buttons = Pick up objects

Left Thumbstick = Move around

Right Thumbstick = Rotate / Piviot

Secondary Button (Y or X) = Exit the game
